tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_sessions (
    session_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (session_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_roles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE qr_code_access (
    user_id INT,
    qr_code_id INT,
    access_granted BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, qr_code_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_roles(user_id)
);
